title.narrative: Buon Ma Thout Extension of Drainage and Sewerage Systems Project

description.narrative:
The overall development goal of the project is to contribute to the reduction of poverty and enhance the general living standard by creating a foundation for economic growth through improvement of the environment and the health status. By extending the existing rainwater- and sewer systems, wastewater treatment plant and training and capacity building of the operation and maintenance organisation in the city of Buon Ma Thout the project will enhance the environment and health conditions and ensure the development of the city by keeping the population in the rural areas.
The immediate objective is to establish sewer systems in the periphery of Buon Ma Thout including construction of a pumping station, all of which is expected to be financed by a subsidised loan. The project also entails a continuation of the campaign for active local involvement and preventive hygiene. This part of the project is planned to be financed by the local authorities.
